The 2025 Haridwar Municipal Corporation election is a municipal election to the Haridwar Municipal Corporation which governs Haridwar city in Uttarakhand. It was held on 23 January 2025.
Election schedule
The election schedule was announced by the state election commission on 23 December 2024.
